thread.title: TransMedia Group To Be Busy Bees Publicizing Bee2Bee Network's Accomplishments Like Its Unique Virtual Tour of Harbourside Place
thread.title_full: TransMedia Group To Be Busy Bees Publicizing Bee2Bee Network's Accomplishments Like Its Unique Virtual Tour of Harbourside Place

author: admin
title: TransMedia Group To Be Busy Bees Publicizing Bee2Bee Network's Accomplishments Like Its Unique Virtual Tour of Harbourside Place
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/8/2015 @ 7:42 AM Companies mentioned in this article: TransMedia Group 
JUPITER, Fla., Sept. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- TransMedia Group to illumine Bee2Bee Network's accomplishments, including its unique virtual tour of Harbourside Place ( www.B2BVirtualGuide.com ) 
TransMedia ( www.transmediagroup.com ) will show how the four-year-old non-profit digital agency is the first to introduce young professionals to coding, social media marketing, software development and Google's latest virtual reality software at no cost. 
According to TransMedia CEO Tom Madden, "Bee2Bee Network has dramatically opened this amazing mall to the public by allowing anyone to walk through and experience its smart retail stores, galleries and restaurants via the unique virtual tour it created." 
Harbourside Place also will be home to the groundbreaking internship/apprenticeship program and full-service Google Digital Agency. 
According to Nicholas Mastroianni III, "We're glad to be part of this innovative project which will serve as the win-win model in demonstrating how local businesses can affordably help our youth prepare for opportunities to compete locally and globally" 
Bee2Bee Network founder Yasmine Clarke said "We're truly grateful and fortunate Mr. Mastroianni was able to share our vision of providing this opportunity to young professionals and the community." 
"Our publicity will show how our soon to be completed "beehive" will serve as a technology hub and learning center for young professionals and the community by also offering open technology classes and labs to the business community, veterans and senior citizens," said Madden 
This Bee2Bee Network opportunity was made possible through a Google Technology Grant enabling students to learn, utilize and customize the latest Google technologies to help local businesses compete. Industry partners also include Qlik, an industry leader in Business Intelligence and Data Visualization Software and Analytics 8, a Qlik Partner and leading Consulting Firm in the BI industry. 
Participants scouted from local universities and high schools are given opportunity to receive industry certification, college, highschool credit and career placement with employers. 
Bee2Bee Network helps local business owners affordably launch and market their business online directly from interactive virtual tours ( www.Bee2BeeNetwork.org ). Users can take an online tour of Harbourside, receive discounts and even buy products. 
Businesses signing up for the B2B Virtual Guide receive a customized package including social media marketing services, website development, Google AdWords, Pay Per Click Advertising, search engine listing verification on Google Map, Google Search, Google+ and a customized Google Virtual Tour. For information visit - www.Bee2BeeNetwork.org or contact Yasmine Clarke at 855-233-2331 (855-bee-bee1) 
Media contact: Cassandra Cardinas 561-750-9800 x2100; cassandra@transmediagroup.com . 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/transmedia-group-to-be-busy-bees-publicizing-bee2bee-networks-accomplishments-like-its-unique-virtual-tour-of-harbourside-place-300139036.html 
SOURCE TransMedia Group
